definition: A residual part or remnant of a living organism that typically refers to the remains or fragments of plants. It is commonly used in the context of biology, ecology, or environmental sciences to describe the leftover or decomposed components of plants after their death or decay.

examples.german: Der Pflanzenrest wird als DÃ¼nger verwendet.
examples.english: The plant residue is used as fertilizer.

examples.german: Es wurden Pflanzenreste im Garten gefunden.
examples.english: Plant debris was found in the garden.
The plant remnants were disposed of.
